feed.subtitle: Russian lies , war crimes , Russia , invasion of ukraine, kremlin, fake news, the true, no censure.

entry.title: War crimes in Bucha
entry.content:
We discover the war crimes of the Russian army in Bucha and elsewhere.

People were shot with their hands tied.

Civilians were shot down in a cowardly manner by Russian soldiers.

These are crimes against humanity.
entry.summary: We discover the war crimes of the Russian army in Bucha and elsewhere. People were shot with their hands tied. Civilians were shot down in a cowardly manner by Russian soldiers. These are crimes against humanity.

entry.title: Clashes in Kherson between civilians and Russian soldiers

link.title: Clashes in Kherson between civilians and Russian soldiers

entry.content: The Ukrainian population does not want the invader and continues to protest, but the army sends tear gas canisters and gunfire to disperse the protesters. One person is seriously injured in the second video.
entry.summary: The Ukrainian population does not want the invader and continues to protest, but the army sends tear gas canisters and gunfire to disperse the protesters. One person is seriously injured in the second video. Sorry, your browser does not support embedded videos. Sorry, your browser does not support embedded videos.

entry.title: Rescuer of the Nazi camps, he dies in a bombing

link.title: Rescuer of the Nazi camps, he dies in a bombing

entry.content:
Boris Romantschenko, a 96-year-old survivor of four Nazi concentration camps, including Buchenwald and Bergen-Belsen, was killed in the bombing of the building where he lived in Kharkiv, in north-eastern Ukraine, on Friday 18 March.

source : Ouest France
entry.summary: Boris Romantschenko, a 96-year-old survivor of four Nazi concentration camps, including Buchenwald and Bergen-Belsen, was killed in the bombing of the building where he lived in Kharkiv, in north-eastern Ukraine, on Friday 18 March. source : Ouest France

link.title: Testimonies of the last journalists in Mariupol

entry.content:
Terrifying testimonies of the last journalists present in Mariupol before their evacuation. There are now no more in the areas still held by the Ukrainians. Follow the links below.

apnews

entry.title: Rape and murder by Russian soldiers

link.title: Rape and murder by Russian soldiers

entry.content:
Exchanges between soldiers and their relatives in Russia show the abuses of Russian soldiers in Ukraine. Murder and rape. War crimes.

source : bfmtv

entry.title: Yulia Zdanovskaya 21 years old killed in Kharkiv by the Russian army

link.title: Yulia Zdanovskaya 21 years old killed in Kharkiv by the Russian army

entry.content: Yulia Zdanovskaya, a 21-year-old mathematician, was killed on 8 March 2022 in a Russian attack on Kharkiv. In 2017, Yulia represented Ukraine at the European Mathematical Olympiad for Girls and won a silver medal.
entry.summary: Yulia Zdanovskaya, a 21-year-old mathematician, was killed on 8 March 2022 in a Russian attack on Kharkiv. In 2017, Yulia represented Ukraine at the European Mathematical Olympiad for Girls and won a silver medal.

entry.title: Russian TV station employee holds up no war sign

link.title: Russian TV station employee holds up no war sign

entry.content: During the news programme Vremya on Russia’s main TV channel, Maria Ovsyannikova, a Channel One employee, rushed in front of the camera with a poster saying stop the war, don’t believe the propaganda. Courage to the Russians who resist.
entry.summary: During the news programme Vremya on Russia’s main TV channel, Maria Ovsyannikova, a Channel One employee, rushed in front of the camera with a poster saying stop the war, don’t believe the propaganda. Courage to the Russians who resist.

entry.title: Tens of thousands of demonstrators in Berlin to support Ukraine

link.title: Tens of thousands of demonstrators in Berlin to support Ukraine

entry.content: Tens of thousands of people demonstrated in Berlin against the war in Ukraine. Yes, in Europe you can demonstrate without being imprisoned. We are free in Europe.
entry.summary: Tens of thousands of people demonstrated in Berlin against the war in Ukraine. Yes, in Europe you can demonstrate without being imprisoned. We are free in Europe. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

entry.title: Russian editing versus reality shown on French TV

link.title: Russian editing versus reality shown on French TV

entry.content:
Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov’s speech to the UN went badly. The whole hemicycle left during his speech, but Russian television made a montage so that the population would believe that everyone was present. You can see this from the French representative’s costume, which is different. The Russian government is lying to its people. It is afraid of its reaction.

source : Quotidien
entry.summary: Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov’s speech to the UN went badly. The whole hemicycle left during his speech, but Russian television made a montage so that the population would believe that everyone was present. You can see this from the French representative’s costume, which is different. The Russian government is lying to its people. It is afraid of its reaction. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. source : Quotidien
